auth.passkeyDescription: Enter the passkey provided to you by one of our moderators. Your passkey is private and should not be shared. Alternatively, you can also scan the QR Code.

privacy.title: Privacy with purpose
privacy.description: Your survey responses help drive meaningful decisions. While your answers aren't stored locally, they are handled with care—securely processed to ensure anonymity and used only to uncover insights that benefit your community. We never sell or misuse your data.

collective.title: Empowering collective action
collective.description: This app is more than a survey tool—it's a way to bring your community together. By sharing your perspectives, you contribute to informed decisions that reflect the needs and values of everyone involved. Every voice matters, and every answer helps shape a better outcome.

description.start: We're committed to using your data responsibly to strengthen your community. By continuing, you agree to our
description.end: , ensuring clarity and trust every step of the way.

genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.
